cause.description:
3ayzeeeen feel CAUSE dah newaree el 3alam kolo 2en el masreeeyen kolohom 2eed wa7da we mafesh far2 been muslim we messe7y 3alashan kolina 2e5wat we elly beye3meel fetan we kalam zay dah .. mayo3tabarsh mennena wala you3tabar muslim wala messe7y .... plzzzzz invite more to show the whole world that we r all in one hand !!!!!!!!
1. Muslim + Christian = Egyptian
